name: Detective Konect
description:
Made in 2 Days for the GMTK GAME JAM! A tricky and fun puzzle game ! In Detective Konect, play as a detective with a limited and "Joined Together" Control Scheme. Detective Konect only executes actions that are joined together and he can only execute these actions a specified number of times! In this game the only goal is to destroy all those damn music boxes in the room!

How To Play:

The actions you can use are all "Joined Together"  you can only use the actions in a predetermined sequence of your making. You can only use the sequence a specified number of times. you can change the order by dragging the words near the clock and swapping them .but they are always remaining "Joined together"

Actions:

Move:

Choose a direction from 4 choices to move to:

Search:

Destroy all music boxes in 4 directions.
